anuruddhayeni, honda tharuna wayasin yuth, mul wayasehi siti, tharunawu kalu kes athi yambandu thopi kam sapa anubhawa karanno wethda, anuruddhayeni, honda tharuna wayasin yuth, mul wayasehi siti, tharunawu kalu kes athi, ee thopi gihigen nikma sasnehi nopawidi wuwahuya, anuruddhayeni, thopi rajunta bayawa panagos gihigen nikma sasnehi pawada wuwahu nowethi, sorunta bayawa panagos gihigen nikma sasnehi pawidi wuwahu nowethi, nayen pidawi gihigen nikma sasnehi pawidi wuwahu nowethi, bayen pidawi gihigen nikma sasnehi pawidi wuwahu nowethi, jiwathwanta nohakiwa gihigen nikma sasnehi pawidi wuwahu nowethi, ethakudu wuwath: ´ipadimen, jara marana dekin, shokayangen, walapimwalin, dukwalin, domnaswalin, upayasayangen yuktha wuyemi, dukata basa gathimi, dukin madana laddemi, me siyalu duk rashiye awasanaya dakkahoth yeheka´ yi, anuruddhayeni, mese thopi shraddhawen gihigen nikma sasnehi pawidi wuwahu nowethda?´´ ´´eseya swamini.´´ 3. ´´ anuruddhayeni, mese pawidiwu kula puthraya wisin kumak kalayuthu wanneda?
